title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Jun 3 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Jun 3 2022
description:
Clay and Buck take apart Biden's pathetic gun control speech. Buck says, "Here's the problem: Their arguments are garbage." Oregon admits decriminalizing drugs didn't work. DeSantis punches back: Uses power to put down the woke left. C&B note he's winning on everything from the Tampa Bay Rays, to Special Olymics, to transgender surgeries. Clueless Joe calls economy "historically robust." Stephen Moore says recession is coming, Clay and Buck agree. Trump comparison? Clay tells it like it is: "If covid doesn't happen, Trump is probably, from an economic perspective, the best thing to ever happen to black Americans in the 21st Century."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
